message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand your perspective, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $190? It's a fair price considering the quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but $170 is cutting it a bit too close. My final offer is $185. Take it or leave it.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I can only go up to $155. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
